title: Reigniting Opportunity for Innovators Act
content: Reigniting Opportunity for Innovators Act This bill amends title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to make qualified founders and full-time employees of small business start-ups eligible for deferring for up to three years their loans under the federal Direct Loan program. If the start-up is located in an economically distressed area, qualified founders and employees are also eligible for loan cancellation of up to $20,000 under that program.
